title: Lace Pattern With Lace Attached, early 20th century
medium: Technique: pattern printed on plain weave fabric, machine woven tape stitched to pattern
markings: Printed on pattern, "No 674,  18 yds,  yoke pattern."
dimensions:
Warp: 52.5 cm [20.75"]  Cut top and bottom.
Weft:  61 cm [24"]   Selvedge to selvedge.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry L. Thompson
description: a. A pattern printed on pink fabric for a lace collar made of pre-made tape.  Pre-made tape has been basted to part of the pattern and needle stitching has filled in some of the areas between the tape. b. The remainder of the pre-made tape is wound on a piece of cardboard.

tombstone.epitaph: Lace Pattern With Lace Attached, early 20th century. Technique: pattern printed on plain weave fabric, machine woven tape stitched to pattern. Gift of Mrs. Henry L. Thompson. 1998-67-1-a,b.
